com.epam.recreation_module.controller

Class TicketController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.recreation_module.controller.TicketController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/ticket")
 @CrossOrigin
public class TicketController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class CommentaryController is an endpoint of the API which used for Ticket Annotated by RestController with no parameters to provide answer in application/json Annotated by RequestMapping with parameter value = "/ticket" Annotated by CrossOrigin with no parameters to give permission to connection So that TicketController is accessed by sending requests to /ticket
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0.0 Nov 25, 2021
    Author:
    Yulchiev Abbos
